release.name: Version 0.7.2
release.body:
## Breaking Changes
The following algorithms are insecure:
* Remove SIKE and SIDH (RUSTSEC-2022-0045)
* Remove Rainbow I algorithms (RUSTSEC-2022-0047)

**See also the changelog for liboqs: https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs/releases/tag/0.7.2**

## Summary of changes in liboqs-rust
* Prettified the markdowns, to be more presentable. by @umgefahren in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/113
* Bump rust edition and derive Eq by @thomwiggers in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/153
* liboqs 0.7.2-rc2 by @thomwiggers in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/152
* liboqs 0.7.2 by @thomwiggers in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/156
* Fix types in `{Sig,Kem}::Algorithm::algorithm_to_id` by  @marcbrevoort-cyberhive in #154 and #155

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/compare/v0.7.1...v0.7.2


## What's Changed per PR
* Prettified the markdowns, to be more presentable. by @umgefahren in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/113
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `a39d08e` to `4d938b1` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/114
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `4d938b1` to `b632938` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/115
* Bump crazy-max/ghaction-github-pages from 2.5.0 to 2.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/116
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `b632938` to `18b3fe3` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/118
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `18b3fe3` to `fb8f0ff` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/119
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `fb8f0ff` to `5b8e2bd` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/120
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `5b8e2bd` to `5894d9a` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/123
* Bump KyleMayes/install-llvm-action from 1.5.0 to 1.5.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/122
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `5894d9a` to `6639d3b` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/125
* Bump actions/checkout from 2.4.0 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/124
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `6639d3b` to `55bc8cb` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/126
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `55bc8cb` to `e858c7a` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/128
* Bump KyleMayes/install-llvm-action from 1.5.1 to 1.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/129
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `e858c7a` to `be8fc96` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/130
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `be8fc96` to `9dea043` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/132
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `9dea043` to `fc7d89c` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/133
* Bump KyleMayes/install-llvm-action from 1.5.2 to 1.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/135
* Bump crazy-max/ghaction-github-pages from 2.6.0 to 3.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/136
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `fc7d89c` to `feea2f3` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/138
* Update bindgen requirement from 0.59 to 0.60 by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/140
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `feea2f3` to `b5484ce` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/139
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `b5484ce` to `38d3014` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/141
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `38d3014` to `719a84e` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/144
* Bump KyleMayes/install-llvm-action from 1.5.3 to 1.5.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/148
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `719a84e` to `af76ca3` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/150
* Bump oqs-sys/liboqs from `af76ca3` to `0511af6` by @dependabot in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/151
* Bump rust edition and derive Eq by @thomwiggers in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/153
* liboqs 0.7.2-rc2 by @thomwiggers in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/152
* Update sig.rs by @marcbrevoort-cyberhive in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/154
* Update kem.rs by @marcbrevoort-cyberhive in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/155

## New Contributors
* @umgefahren made their first contribution in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/113
* @marcbrevoort-cyberhive made their first contribution in https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/pull/154

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs-rust/compare/v0.7.1...v0.7.2

release.name: OQS-libssh-snapshot-2022-08
release.body:
OQS-libssh snapshot 2022-08
===========================

About
-----

The **Open Quantum Safe (OQS) project** has the goal of developing and prototyping quantum-resistant cryptography.  More information on OQS can be found on our website: https://openquantumsafe.org/ and on Github at https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/.

**liboqs** is an open source C library for quantum-resistant cryptographic algorithms.

**OQS-libssh** is an integration of quantum-resistant algorithm from liboqs into (a fork of) libssh.  The goal of this integration is to provide easy prototyping of quantum-resistant cryptography.  The integration should not be considered "production quality".

Release notes
=============

This is the 2022-08 snapshot release of OQS-libssh, released on August 29, 2022. This release is intended to be used with [liboqs version 0.7.2](https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs/releases/tag/0.7.2) and interoperates with OQS-OpenSSH v8.9p1 (as of commit [f41bbe652c522db1bec388f82db369e4e5f0f405](https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/openssh/tree/f41bbe652c522db1bec388f82db369e4e5f0f405)).

What's New
----------

This is the second snapshot release of the OQS fork of libssh. It is based on the libssh 0.10 development branch master as of commit [76b7e0e](https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/libssh/commit/4975487c18090e24ff97208022a605a15351e773).

- Update key and message formats to interoperate with the OQS-OpenSSH branch based on OpenSSH v8.x.
- Remove Rainbow level 1 and SIKE/SIDH.
- Add regular continuous integration against the latest versions of liboqs and OQS-OpenSSH.
